datasets.name: dataset0
datasets.description: Dataset used for initially provided github repo https://github.com/sheelabhadra/Emergency-Vehicle-Detection. Be aware that they use the evaluation set for both validaton and testing: https://github.com/sheelabhadra/Emergency-Vehicle-Detection/blob/c0e59729d4eaf9389c27bc5c0891a8283f6dc835/Paper-3/em_detection.py#L167. Only recommended for reproducing results, not for active development.
